Hi Matt, that is certainly possible. The material encrusting the blade seems 
the same as what coats the tsuba, and a decoration on the end of the mekugi, 
so I am not sure either way. Unfortunately this is not one of those early 
swords that can be partially polished... the corrosion is too thorough, so I have 
no problem with leaving the sword in its current condition... 

In a message dated 8/23/2004 4:08:22 PM Eastern Daylight Time, 
matthewhoyle@... writes:

> The dirt might actually be the remnants of the scabbard, or is that not
> possible?
> 
> If this is the case, I would be inclined to leave it as is, but I really do
> not know anything about this stuff :-)
> 
> Matt
